Title: ExxonMobil agrees to buy 2 mtpa of LNG from Venture Global’s CP2 and Plaquemines projects
Description: US project developer Venture Global has signed two long-term sales agreements with ExxonMobil LNG Asia Pacific for a total of 2 mtpa of LNG from its Plaquemines and CP2 LNG project in Louisiana.
Author: CK

Title: China’s LNG imports edge lower in April; Australia and Qatar ship less
Description: China’s LNG imports edged lower in April as elevated LNG prices and the impact of Covid restrictions particularly in eastern China weighed on demand and extended a decline in LNG receipts since February.
Author: CK

Title: EGAS, ADNOC offer May-June LNG cargoes; Gail, Hokkaido Electric seek cargoes
Description: Egypt’s state-owned EGAS is offering one cargo that will load on May 24-25 at its 5 mtpa Damietta LNG terminal through a tender closing tomorrow, while Abu Dhabi’s state-owned ADNOC LNG  has issued a tender closing on May 12 to sell a cargo loading on June 17-21 at its 5.8 mtpa LNG export facility on Das Island.
Author: CK
